hero.longDescription: With every stroke, I bring beings, symbols and energies to your skin that remind you of your nature, your power and the present moment.

personal.title: Who I am
personal.description: I am a wilderness educator, draftsman, stoic â€“ today a tattoo artist with soul. As a child I wanted to be an artist, but my path first led to wilderness and psychology. My art is expression, story and self-empowerment.
personal.whyDescription: I love going deep with people. The skin is not just a canvas for me, but a threshold â€“ between inside and outside, past and future. Every tattoo is a dialogue for me: What do you want to show? What do you want to connect to? I don't just tattoo, I accompany transformation.

2018.title: 2018: Wilderness Educator
2018.description: I worked with children and young people, brought them closer to nature â€“ my first conscious service to something greater. But the desire to create spiritual art quietly accompanied me further.

2019.title: 2019: Declined Tattoo Training
2019.description: My neighbor in Hannover at the time â€“ an experienced tattoo artist â€“ offered me training. But I declined. My heart was still beating for educational work in the wilderness at that time.

2020.title: 2020: Self-taught Entry
2020.description: The passion for tattooing wouldn't let me go. Two years later I picked up the tattoo machine myself â€“ without training, but with dedication. I learned through experience, exchange and constant practice.

2022-2024.title: 2022â€“2024: Australia
2022-2024.description: To be artistically free, I needed financial independence. In Australia I worked alone to exhaustion â€“ over 16 months, 65 hours per week â€“ in kitchens, on farms, in huge warehouses. Goal: save to live my vision.

2024.title: 2024: Southeast Asia & Software Development
2024.description: After this intense time I traveled through Indonesia and Vietnam. I learned to ride motorcycles, found friends â€“ and started online training as a software developer to work remotely and live my art independently of location.

2024-2025.title: 2024 - 2025: Hunt Atelier MÃ¼nster
2024-2025.description: Back in Germany I completed my training and found a place at Hunt Atelier â€“ a studio that shares my values. Here I live what I am: artist, tattoo artist, someone who heals through expression and tells stories on skin.

style.title: Style & Inspiration
style.description: My motifs are expressions of inner worlds â€“ mystical, organic, spiritual. I prefer to work in black and white, with strong contrast, fine lines and symbolic depth. I let myself be inspired by forms of nature as well as anatomy and symbolically use the eye as a source of power for presence. In a free, intuitive process I connect these elements with form-creating shading to visually work out clarity.

eye.title: The Eye
eye.description: The eye appears in many of my tattoos â€“ a symbol of mindfulness. It reminds us of the present moment, of the now â€“ that space where everything is one: steady, eternal, undivided. There is power in presence. My art is an invitation to remember â€“ every time your gaze touches the tattoo and pulls you back from the vortex of thoughts into being. A silent call to consciousness: You are here. You are whole.

general.title: General Information
general.description: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. Detailed information on the subject of data protection can be found in our privacy policy listed below this text.

responsible.title: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
responsible.description: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section "Note on the responsible party" in this privacy policy.

how.title: How do we collect your data?
how.description: Your data is collected on the one hand by you communicating it to us. This can be, for example, data that you enter in a contact form. Other data is collected automatically or after your consent when visiting the website by our IT systems. These are mainly technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system or time of page access). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter this website.

purpose.title: What do we use your data for?
purpose.description: Part of the data is collected to ensure error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior. If contracts can be concluded or initiated via the website, the transmitted data will also be processed for contract offers, orders or other service requests.

rights.title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
rights.description: You have the right at any time to receive free information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. You also have the right to request restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. Furthermore, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
rights.contact: For this purpose and for further questions on the subject of data protection, you can contact us at any time.

In all other cases, the processing is based on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR) and/or on our legitimate interest in the effective processing of requests addressed to us (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
